item.title: NEM Karma 42 - Selection by Aldo Pacheco
item.description:
NEM Karma 42 - Selection by Aldo Pacheco

These are the 8 selected artworks by Aldo Pacheco for NEM Karma 42 ALDO PACHECO NEM FOUNDER ARTIST AND CURATOR FOR NEM KARMA NEM GoodKarma is an action where you can contribute with images about what represents the influence of reality, dreams and desires that will enlighten our life and spirit in a cyclical way based on "what you give is what you get" and made us life in harmony with the universe.

item.description:
NEM P.U.R.E Selection 08 by Lisa Peters & Aldo Pacheco

Curators: Lisa Peters and Aldo Pacheco LISA PETERS - NEM ARTIST & ALDO PACHECO - NEM FOUNDER ARTIST - CURATORS OF NEM P.U.R.E. SELECTED ARTWORKS BY: Linda Sbath, Allyson Marie, Edward Santos, Basia Łucka, José Pinto Antunes, Joanne Mariol, Dani Salvadori and Kathy Clay‎ Linda Sbath. Allyson Marie. Edward Santos.

item.title: NEM Streets 01 - Selection by Emanuel Faria
item.description:
NEM Streets 01 - Selection by Emanuel Faria

THESE ARE THE 8 ENTRIES SELECTED BY EMANUEL FARIA FOR THE "NEM STREETS" FACEBOOK GROUP. EMANUEL FARIA - NEM FOUNDER ARTIST AND CURATOR FOR "NEM STREETS." I Love wen you make my work hard. Great job every one, keep coming those fantastic shoots, capturing the city's streets.

item.title: Impossible Humans Vittorio Veneto Film Festival Selection
item.description:
Impossible Humans Vittorio Veneto Film Festival Selection

What follows is a selection of the best shots during the 7th edition of Vittorio Veneto Film Festival.A fantastic collection of real Impossible, Genial, Artistic and Special Humans that I have had the honor to know and photograph. Thank you very much. Andrea Bigiarini "Be Human. Be Unexpected"
